description: This rule looks for Windows Installer service (msiexec.exe) trying to install MSI packages with SYSTEM privilege
name: Always Install Elevated Windows Installer
query: ((user.name:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*) AND ((process.executable:*\\Windows\\Installer\\* AND process.executable:*msi* AND process.executable:*tmp) OR (process.executable:*\\msiexec.exe AND IntegrityLevel:"System"))) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe") OR (process.command_line:*\\system32\\msiexec.exe\ \/V OR process.parent.command_line:*\\system32\\msiexec.exe\ \/V))))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Mangatas Tondang (rule)
oscd.community
